result.arabic_text: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَيَوۡمَ تَقُومُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَخۡسَرُ ٱلۡمُبۡطِلُونَ
result.translation: 27. Qaranwaa kee baaxô reedá Yalli-le, qhiyaama solta ayró Yallih inkittinaanee kee Yalli isi farmoytal oobiseh y an aayoota yangadde mari (koros kinnuk) kasaaritaah finqitah too ayró.
